div.p: Dependence of negative CO 2 emissions needed to balance residual emissions of CH 4 and N 2O (given as Mt CH 4 and Mt N 2O, respectively) on metric choice. For the left-hand panel, the bar height indicates the mean of the distribution of CH 4 and N 2O emissions in 2100, with the extent of the error bar marking the 5th–95th percentiles of the distribution. For the right-hand panel the bar heights indicate the mean net negative CO 2 emissions needed to balance the combinations of 2100 CH 4 (orange) and N 2O emissions (brown) present in the scenarios partitioned by metric ( x-axis). The 5th–95th percentiles of the distribution of the total required net negative CO 2 emissions are marked by the vertical extent of the bars.
